id: Gender inequality linked to deaths of girls under 5, new analysis says
paragraph: Set edition preference:Set edition preference:Set edition preference:By Nina Avramova, CNNUpdated 6:30 PM ET, Tue October 30, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds. (CNN)In countries where women face more unequal treatment in society, young girls have a lower chance of survival, a new analysis finds.Sign up here to get The Results Are In with Dr. Sanjay Gupta every Tuesday from the CNN Health team.
